greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Characteristic function of A336357, numbers k for which A001221(A000203(k)) < A001221(k).
comment: If a(x) = a(y) = 1 and gcd(x,y) = 1, then a(x*y) = 1 also. For example, we can take x = 372 = 2^2 * 3 * 31, y = 385 = 5 * 7 * 11, and x*y = 372*385 = 143220. On all these points, a(n) = 1.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 20 2020
